name: Gloomhaven: Demonsgate
description:
This is an unofficial text-adventure, based in the Gloomhaven universe---more specifically, in Gloomhaven's sister city, Demonsgate. 

Following my work writing on Gloomhaven Digital, I found myself enamoured with Demonsgate, a new city and region of the world created for the game's Guildmaster Mode which I helped worldbuild. 

I then decided to create this text adventure Demonsgate as a way for myself and others to explore the region as I saw it in my head, taking inspiration from the seminal Fabled Lands gamebook series.

The work is still in a demo stage at the moment, which was used as a university assessment, and I am adding to it when I can. 

Images courtesy of https://creator.nightcafe.studio/.

Known Bugs

The link that starts the game will only appear once 'restart' is clicked in the top right corner. I'm working on this. 

Options surrounded by X's (XLike ThisX) currently do not work, but are planned.
